content: You need precedence at least arg for it to be used as an argument. If a syntax starts and ends with a token, the default precedence is max, otherwise lead. See https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/blob/45917f2f900f177259eebc7a6740193f86292927/src/Init/Notation.lean#L23-L28 for their descriptions and order.
In other words: just remove all precedences, should be fine
Thanks, it is starting to make sense a bit more and mainly it works now :)
Tomas Skrivan has marked this topic as resolved.
